system.description:
You have learned to further combine your elemental prowess with the use of your bonded artifact. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half of your elementalist levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining access to the Extra Attack and Spellsword features.
  • Half of your wielder levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining the damage done by your elemental blast.
  • You can use an element you have affinity for to recharge your Artifact of power in an emergency. If you are out of both artifact charges and spell points, you can rest your bonded artifact in an element you have affinity with for one minute to regain artifact charges equal to your proficiency bonus (air or water must be in motion; the artifact must be held aloft in high winds or submerged in running water to recharge). Once you have used this benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
